author: rafaellopesdesa
body: I am working to update #17101 , but I would like to have all showershapes used in the regression already calculated inside the objects. We recently decided to sync the electron and photon regressions and the electron object did not have the 2x5 shower shapes, which are being added. I also added the saturation information that is now added as input for the regression (in both GsfElectron and Photon. This is a smaller big change, because it has to be propagated to miniAOD, which is also done here.
title: Add 2x5 shower-shape and saturation info for electrons and photons
